channel.description:

If you would like to help the rep system a little bit better, that would be a good way.

item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:44, topic:343283”]I still don’t see a problem with a reset and new rules and regulations in place on rep. The only reason rep keeps getting this bad is because they reset it, people go back to repping for no reason, then we still have the same problem on our hands its because every time it has been reset nothing new was added to keep it in check. Think of rep as the USA government we need to set up a system that keeps each part in check to make sure not one of the parts can start to over run the entire system like now with all the rep ++ or rep – abuse, people repping for dumb reasons, people gaining 200 rep for no reasoning, people who don’t deserve rep get it because they post nice little comments on peoples download topics, etc you know the whole story here.

We need to set up system to make it so we can tell who really does deserve the reputation were it is needed. Not just reset and say don’t abuse, because we all know it isn’t even being fixed that way its just like a band-aid.[/quote]I’ve deserved and earned my rep
